  The percentage of all facilities 
performing specific life-saving 
interventions called “signal functions” 
increased. By the end of Phase 1, both 
countries had an adequate number 
of facilities (relative to each district’s 
population) to provide Basic and 
Comprehensive EmONC. In particular, 
middle-level health clinics in both 
countries made substantial gains in 
their ability to perform more life-saving 
interventions.
